trans-unit.source: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of a provider's implementation of the data source classes.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conjunto de métodos para criar instâncias de uma implementação de provedor das classes de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityProviderFactory> provides a common entry point to obtain <xref:System.Data.EntityClient> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityProviderFactory> fornece um ponto de entrada comuns para obter <xref:System.Data.EntityClient> classes.

trans-unit.source: For conceptual information about how to use <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityProviderFactory>, see [ADO.NET Entity Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a437041f-6899-4ae7-96ce-aabf528d7205) and [DbProviderFactories](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dbproviderfactories.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações conceituais sobre como usar <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityProviderFactory>, consulte [ADO.NET Entity Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a437041f-6899-4ae7-96ce-aabf528d7205) e [DbProviderFactories](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dbproviderfactories.md).

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: Gera uma <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para este método atualmente.

trans-unit.source: This method is currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para este método atualmente.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityProviderFactory.CreateDataAdapter" /> is not supported in this version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para <see cref="M:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityProviderFactory.CreateDataAdapter" /> nesta versão do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a classe <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the provider's version of the <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma nova instância da classe do provedor que implementa a versão do provedor da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> object for the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityProviderFactory" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityProviderFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the requested <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a classe <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> solicitada.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: The supported types are <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderServices" />, <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinitionBuilder" />, and <see cref="T:System.Data.IEntityAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos com suporte são <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderServices" />, <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinitionBuilder" /> e <see cref="T:System.Data.IEntityAdapter" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns null (or <see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for every other type.
trans-unit.target: Retorna nulo (ou <see langword="Nothing" /> no [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) para todos os outros tipos.
